summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the behavior of numerous utility functions used by the LLM proxy, including token counting, message trimming, model metadata handling, environment validation, async HTTP handling, and related helper logic.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of core utility components in the LLM proxy system by automatically testing token management, model support checks, configuration validation, and networking helpers, thereby preventing regressions and supporting stable LLM integrations.
